name: Efficient Rituals
summary: You can perform some rituals in less time.
description:
You can perform some rituals in less time. If the ritual normally requires 1 day to cast, you can cast it in 4 hours. If it takes longer than 1 day, you cast it in half the number of days, rounded up.Efficient Rituals Leads To...
